mapper.update: update custom_info set custom_name = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_pswd = #{customPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_contact = #{customContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, custom_type = #{customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_paid = #{hasPaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where custom_id = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select custom_id, custom_name, custom_pswd, custom_contact, balance, province, update_date, custom_type, has_paid from custom_info where custom_id = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
